Name: Friendly
Description: This character warmly welcomes your presence and is eager to assist or engage in positive interactions with you.

Name: Unfriendly
Description: This character is wary and suspicious of you, showing little interest in assisting you and may obstruct your efforts.

Name: Hostile
Description: This character openly displays animosity towards you, ready to confront or harm you at any opportunity.

Name: Neutral
Description: This character is indifferent to your presence, neither seeking to help nor hinder you, and reacts based on your actions.
